title: Guidance: EU rules on drivers’ hours and working time: simplified guidance
text:
28 March 2017, see all updates Simplified guidance on European Union (EU) rules on drivers’ hours and working time. Documents PDF , 712KB , 23 pages This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format. If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email . Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use. Details 
There are EU drivers’ hours and working time rules which apply to drivers of large goods vehicles and passenger-carrying vehicles. 
This guidance has been produced by the Department of Transport with industry stakeholders (including trade associations and trade unions) to help drivers better understand how the drivers’ hours and working time rules work together. 
This guidance is not a substitute for the current full guidance documents on drivers’ hours and working time . Related documents 
This simplified guidance was drafted following a recommendation in a report from a stakeholder (trade associations and unions) working group.
